xmlmc.api

Class Helpdesk

  • java.lang.Object
    • xmlmc.api.Service
      • xmlmc.api.Helpdesk

  • public class Helpdesk
extends Service
    The Wrapper for the helpdesk service of the xmlmc API. Extends api.Service Access it from the XmlMethodCall class.
    Author:
    Rich Gordon

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Helpdesk.LockReason
      Status values for locking a call ASSIGN, CLOSE, CANCEL, CHANGECLASS, HOLD, ISSUE, WORKFLOW

      • acceptCalls

        public Response acceptCalls(boolean markAsSLAResponse,
                            java.lang.String... callrefs)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Accept one or more calls

        acceptCalls(true, "7568","1247","4448")

        Parameters:
        markAsSLAResponse - Mark the acceptance as an SLA response
        callrefs - one or more unformatted callrefs to accept.
        Returns:
        returns instance of response object Response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addFilesToCallDiaryItem

        public Response addFilesToCallDiaryItem(java.lang.String callref,
                                        java.lang.String udid,
                                        java.lang.String fileName)
                                 throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        Add a file attachment to an existing update entry. The file must be readable as this method will attempt to base64 encode the file data.
        Parameters:
        callref - Callref to add the attachment to
        udid - Update Id to associate the attachment with
        fileName - Full path of the file to add. The file must be readable
        Returns:
        Request
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException

      • assignCalls

        public Response assignCalls(java.lang.String groupId,
                            java.lang.String... callrefs)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Assign one or more calls to a group

        assignCallsToGroup("api.Helpdesk", "1234", "5866")

        also

        assignCallsToGroup("api.Helpdesk", ["1234","5866"])

        Parameters:
        groupId - Id of group to assign the calls to
        callrefs - One or more unformatted callrefs or an array of unformatted callrefs
        Returns:
        returns Response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                                     throws java.io.IOException
        get the number of calls assigned to an analyst
        Parameters:
        analystId - ID of the analyst to check
        groupId - The group ID of the analyst to check. The values will differ from group to group as this only checks the calls assigned to the analyst within that group context
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • holdCalls

        public Response holdCalls(java.lang.String callref,
                          int timeSpent,
                          java.lang.String description,
                          java.lang.String holdUntil)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This is a simple implementation of the place call on hold method. A more complex method can add file attachments update sources and extra database values. This will be implemented soon.
        Parameters:
        callref - call reference to place on hold
        timeSpent - time spent on the call
        description - reason for placing on hold
        holdUntil - date time string of the format dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss
        Returns:
        Request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • lockcalls

        public Response lockcalls(Helpdesk.LockReason reason,
                          java.lang.String... callrefs)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Invoke this method to manually lock a call. Calls are automatically locked when performing actions that require it. note: in order to be able to perform any action on the call again, a manual unlock is also required.
        Parameters:
        reason - Helpdesk.LockReason
        callrefs - one or more callref strings to lock
        Returns:
        Request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Create a call and defer the logging of it until later
        Parameters:
        call - Call object representing the call to be logged
        logDate - The date and time to log the call in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss see: W3Schools for more details
        groupId - The group the call is assigned to when it logs
        Returns:
        Request
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
